description:
DePa Pirate who:
-----------------
1.- PURCHASED the only one NFT (Black and White version) minted to help the cause.

2.- SOLD this NFT in the open market to keep the campaign going. 

3.- COPIED the following stament:

@DePa_Pirates 4 Ukraine

‚úÖ Help support humanitarian efforts in Ukraine

‚úÖ Your donation will go to the United Nations Crisis Relief Fund focused on Ukraine üôè

‚úÖ‚úÖ‚úÖ Supporting a REAL cause!

https://soonaverse.com/collection/0x604e4e5b5d3f5937078323f67f60acd43e903908

4.- And lastly, TWEETED the statement above, including a picture of the Soonaverse sale transaction showing his/her Soonaverse handle.
name: DePa Pirate 4 Ukraine who donated & tweeted
